Sun.general: Represents identity, ego, self-expression and vitality.
Sun.career: Sun energizes leadership and visibility in professional life.
Sun.love: Sun brings warmth, generosity and pride into relationships.

Moon.general: Represents emotions, inner world, intuition and nurturing energy.
Moon.career: Moon influences work environment mood, intuition in decisions.
Moon.love: Moon governs emotional bonding, sensitivity and nurturing in love.

Mars.general: Represents ambition, drive, assertiveness and conflict.
Mars.career: Mars fuels ambition, aggression, and competitive drive at work.
Mars.love: Mars brings passion and physical attraction but may cause conflicts.

Mercury.general: Represents communication, logic, travel and intelligence.
Mercury.career: Mercury enhances communication, analytical skills and business acumen.
Mercury.love: Mercury governs flirting, conversation and intellectual chemistry.

Jupiter.general: Represents wisdom, growth, fortune and knowledge.
Jupiter.career: Jupiter brings expansion, good fortune and wisdom to career endeavors.
Jupiter.love: Jupiter promotes generosity, optimism and growth in relationships.

Venus.general: Represents love, harmony, relationships and art.
Venus.career: Venus enhances creativity, networking, charm and artistic abilities.
Venus.love: Venus directly governs romance, attraction, beauty and harmony in love.

Saturn.general: Represents discipline, responsibility, boundaries and lessons.
Saturn.career: Saturn rewards hard work over time but may bring delays and tests.
Saturn.love: Saturn teaches commitment and patience but may create emotional distance.

Rahu.general: Represents obsession, illusion, worldly desires and sudden changes.
Rahu.career: Rahu brings sudden gains, unconventional paths and foreign connections.
Rahu.love: Rahu creates unusual or obsessive attractions, karmic relationships.

Ketu.general: Represents spirituality, detachment, past karma and liberation.
Ketu.career: Ketu brings detachment from material success, focus on inner work.
Ketu.love: Ketu creates karmic separations or deeply spiritual partnerships.
